notes_text: Class B substance – life imprisonment is possible for use and maximum 8 years for possession (at the maximum 2 years for the first offense for people under 25).
notes: Class B substance – life imprisonment is possible for use and maximum 8 years for possession (at the maximum 2 years for the first offense for people under 25).
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Cyprus}} Class B substance – life imprisonment is possible for use and maximum 8 years for possession (at the maximum 2 years for the first offense for people under 25).<ref>{{cite web|title=Overviews of legal topics: possession of cannabis for personal use|url=http://www.emcdda.europa.eu/legal-topic-overviews/cannabis-possession-for-personal-use|publisher=[[European Monitoring Centre for Drugs and Drug Addiction]]|access-date=26 July 2015|archive-date=30 September 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180930083140/http://www.emcdda.europa.eu/legal-topic-overviews/cannabis-possession-for-personal-use|url-status=live}}</ref>
